index.md.Plugin très simple permettant de mettre: Very simple plugin allowing you to put the HTML / javascript / Css code you want on its equipment tile.
index.md.Le plugin necessite de savoir coder en H: The plugin needs to know how to code in HTML, Javascript and CSS, no support will be provided by the Jeedom team on the code of your widget.
index.md.inclusion d'information exterieure à Jee: inclusion of outside information at Jeedom
index.md.Pour rappel les designs utilisent TOUJOU: As a reminder, the designs ALWAYS use the dashboard version of the code (whether on mobile or desktop)
